member_id.description: [string]The member id of the faction member to spawn from the enemy sheet.

spawn_flag.description: Indicates with which flags are we going to spawn the enemy.

ability_activate.description: The ability to play when the spanwer activates.

ability_deactivate.description: The ability to play when the spanwer deactivates.

ability_spawn_start.description: The ability to play when the spanwer spawn_starts.

ability_spawn_done.description: The ability to play when the spanwer spawn_dones.

spawn_start_duration.description: When the spawner starts spawning, wait this amount until the first unit spawns (to allow time for ability to run).

spawn_stop_duration.description: When the spawner starts spawning, wait this amount until the first unit spawns (to allow time for ability to run).

spawn_lanes.description: List of lanes (ability/node pairs) for spawning squads. Only valid if spawn_type is AiSpawnerSpawnType_Bughole.

audio_source_node.description: [string]The node on the unit that we should play the idle sound from.

idle_started_sound.description: [wwise]The sound event to trigger on spawn.

idle_stopped_sound.description: [wwise]The sound event to trigger when dead/is removed.

explosive_trigger_enter_sound.description: [wwise]The sound event to trigger when an explosive enters the explosive trigger area.

explosive_demolition_riser_sound.description: [wwise]Like explosive trigger enter sound, except it is only triggered when the explosive demolition strength is enough to destroy the spawner when it explodes.

production_queue_limit.description: The maximum number of enemies produced waiting to be spawned.

spawn_count.description: The number of enemies that will spawn in each 'wave' (taken from the production queue). If production queue contains less, it will wait.

spawn_count_minimum.description: The number of enemies to spawn at least. If the outpost spawn limit would cap the spawn count lower than this, it will wait. If left to 0, it will assume the same value as spawn_count

production_cooldown.description: The time between an enemy is produced.

spawn_cooldown.description: The time between an enemy is spawned. If no enemy is produced, it will wait for an enemy to be produced and then immediately spawn it.

spawn_delay.description: The delay between each individual spawn in a 'wave'.

cooldown_variation.description: Varies the cooldown of each spawner by this amount +/-%.

spawns_npcs.description: [bool]Set to true to spawn friendly NPCs instead of enemies

ignore_tags.description: [bool]Set to true to ignore tag requirements

ignore_guard_force.description: [bool]Set to true to spawn friendly NPCs instead of enemies

sequential_lanes.description: [bool]Will use the spawn lanes sequentially for the duration of the spawn count

use_global_spawner_cooldown.description: [bool]Indicates if this spawner will be affected by the global cooldown or not.
